alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 1:16PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Stevens County through 145 PM PDT... At 116 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Colville moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Addy. This includes U.S. Highway 395 in Washington between mile markers 214 and 222. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
